headerSection.quote: Orangefit was made, because you deserve the best.

whyUsSection.heading: Why choose orangefit ?
whyUsSection.firstReason: Weekly customized meal plan for you
whyUsSection.firstParagraph:
Different day = different meals (250+ healthy recipes with full instructions)
Who said dieting is boring !
whyUsSection.secondParagraph: (500+ instructional workouts videos by Dr Michel , to guarantee you are performing the right technique)
whyUsSection.thirdreason: Daily Weight tracking, and monthly check ups from the expert himself !
whyUsSection.thirdParagraph: To make sure you are on the right track.

downloadSection.motivation: Level Up Your Fitness Journey With Orangefit App.
downloadSection.advice: The only app you will need to reach your dream body.

opinionsSection.heading:

Here’s the proof

clientsData.title: 10 Kgs in 3 weeks
clientsData.paragraph: “I tried all the diets in the world and failed, Even when I lose weight , I gain it back because the diets were unsustainable. Thank god I discovered orangefit.”

expertSection.heading: Meet our expert
expertSection.goal: “My goal is to let everybody get the healthy life they deserve, no matter where they are from or how much money they have”
expertSection.articleParagraph:
I know how much you suffered,
I know how many diets you tried,
to reach the body you deserve and failed,
The problem is not you,
The problem is the boring food, hunger in the diets you chose.
Orangefit is the solution.
